title: Bug 49235 - ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? classSet is not expected
description: Bug 49235 - ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? The output is "MySomeClass".
OB: When running my code on Tomcat 7.0.0, the output of the ServletContainerInitializer onStartup() method is "MySomeAnn", instead of the expected output of "MySomeClass". The code works fine on Glassfish 3.0.
